pack.apocalypse.name: §lApocalypse§r Gun Pack
pack.apocalypse.desc: Experience the largest conflict in human history like never before.

bf1.gun.tg1918.desc: The first anti-materiel rifle, designed by Mauser in 1918.
bf1.gun.mg0815.desc:
A lighter version of the MG08.
Known as the 'devil's paintbrush.'
bf1.gun.vp1915.desc:
An early SMG with terrifying fire rate.
Originally used as an aircraft gun in 1915.
bf1.gun.mhgl.desc: Martini-Henry modified with the Blanch-Chevallier system.
bf1.gun.wex.desc:
A compact 1917 flamethrower.
Perfect for dealing with armored enemies.
bf1.gun.m1916.desc:
Mauser's early semi-auto rifle.
Known for high precision.
bf1.gun.smg0818.desc:
A mini version of LMG08/18.
Only two exist today!
bf1.gun.sw_model3.desc:
A break-action revolver from 1870 by S&W.
It has strong stopping power.
bf1.gun.model10.desc:
A 1908 pump shotgun by Remington.
Has excellent range.
bf1.gun.lewis.desc:
Iconic LMG used by British forces.
The cooling shroud? Less effective.
bf1.gun.obrez.desc:
A Mosin-Nagant cut-down pistol.
Vital for Red Army guerrillas.
bf1.gun.vg15.desc:
A crude last-ditch rifle using StG44 mags. 
Not very reliable.
bf1.gun.ef46.desc:
A disposable flamethrower used by Volkssturm.
§cCannot be reloaded.
bf1.gun.f_faust.desc:
A nine-tube unguided anti-air rocket system.
Accuracy requires luck.
bf1.gun.man_m95.desc: A straight-pull bolt rifle of the Austro-Hungarian Army.
bf1.gun.kolibri.desc:
A 2mm pocket pistol designed by a clockmaker.
Might struggle against a leather jacket.
bf1.ammo.fuel.name: §6Fuel
bf1.ammo.medkit.name: §6Medkit
bf1.attachment.grip_trench_bipods.name: Trench Bipods
bf1.attachment.marksman_scope.name: §6PPCo 2.5-4x Scope
bf1.attachment.sniper_scope.name: §6PPCo 6-10x Scope
bf1.attachment.ammo_mod_slug.name: §eSlug Ammo
bf1.attachment.oem_muzzle_choke.name: Shotgun Choke
bf1.attachment.bayonet_general.name: General Bayonet
bf1.attachment.sight_nydar.name: Nydar Model 47 Reflex Sight
bf1.attachment.ammo_mod_slug.desc:
Slug rounds replace buckshot for higher accuracy.
But reduce damage and speed.
bf1.block.telegraph.desc:
Used to call in supplies from the past.
Protect it from explosions!
